rules_text:
Offspring–Tap an untapped creature you control. [i](You may pay the offspring cost as an additional cost. If you do, when this creature enters, create a 1/1 token copy of it.)[/i]
You may have Vitalia Tragedienne enter as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it’s a Noble in addition to its other types. [i](It’s offspring will be a 1/1 Noble copy of that creature.)[/i]
